TableInfo.QueryValue: SELECT '0' VALUECD, 'Tổng GT tài khoản' DISPLAY FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '1' VALUECD, 'Cổ phiếu' DISPLAY FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '2' VALUECD, 'Tiền mặt' DISPLAY FROM DUAL ORDER BY DISPLAY
select cdval valuecd, cdcontent display, cdval value from allcode where cdname='REROLE' union all select 'ALL' valuecd, 'ALL' display, 'ALL' value from DUAL ORDER BY DISPLAY
select 'ALL' valuecd, 'ALL' display, 'ALL' value from DUAL union all select cdval valuecd, cdcontent display, cdval value from allcode where cdname='REROLE' ORDER BY DISPLAY
select * from ( select cdval value, cdcontent display, lstodr from allcode where cdname='REROLE' union all select 'ALL' value, 'ALL' display, -1 lstodr from DUAL ) ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT CDVAL VALUE, CDCONTENT DISPLAY, CDVAL VALUECD, CDCONTENT EN_DISPLAY, CDCONTENT DESCRIPTION, CDCONTENT EN_DESCRIPTION FROM (SELECT CDVAL, CDCONTENT, LSTODR FROM ALLCODE WHERE CDTYPE = 'OD' AND CDNAME = 'TRADEPLACE' AND CDVAL IN ('001','002','005') UNION SELECT '999' CDVAL, 'HOSE + HNX' CDCONTENT, 0 LSTODR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '888' CDVAL, 'HNX + UPCOM' CDCONTENT, 0 LSTODR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'ALL' CDVAL, 'ALL' CDCONTENT, -1 LSTODR FROM DUAL) ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT 'ALL' VALUECD, 'ALL' DISPLAY, 'ALL' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'TP' VALUECD, 'Trái phiếu' DISPLAY, 'TP' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'CP' VALUECD, 'Cổ phiếu' DISPLAY, 'CP' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'CCQ' VALUECD, 'Chứng chỉ quỹ' DISPLAY, 'CCQ' VALUE FROM DUAL ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT 'ALL' VALUECD, 'ALL' DISPLAY, 'ALL' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '001' VALUECD, 'Thông thường' DISPLAY, '001' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '002' VALUECD, 'Tự doanh' DISPLAY, '002' VALUE FROM DUAL ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT 'ALL' VALUECD, 'ALL' DISPLAY, 'ALL' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'IC' VALUECD, 'Cá nhân trong nước' DISPLAY, 'IC' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'BC' VALUECD, 'Tổ chức trong nước' DISPLAY, 'BC' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'IF' VALUECD, 'Cá nhân nước ngoài' DISPLAY, 'IF' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'BF' VALUECD, 'Tổ chức nước ngoài' DISPLAY, 'BF' VALUE FROM DUAL ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT 'ALL' VALUECD, 'ALL' DISPLAY, 'ALL' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '001' VALUECD, 'Tại MSBS' DISPLAY, '001' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '002' VALUECD, 'Lưu ký nơi khác' DISPLAY, '002' VALUE FROM DUAL ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT 'ALL' VALUECD, 'ALL' DISPLAY, 'ALL' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'NB' VALUECD, 'Mua' DISPLAY, 'NB' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'NS' VALUECD, 'Bán' DISPLAY, 'NS' VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'MS' VALUECD, 'Bán cầm cố' DISPLAY, 'MS' VALUE FROM DUAL ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT CDVAL VALUE, CDCONTENT DISPLAY, CDVAL VALUECD, CDCONTENT EN_DISPLAY, CDCONTENT DESCRIPTION, CDCONTENT EN_DESCRIPTION FROM (SELECT CDVAL, CDCONTENT, LSTODR FROM ALLCODE WHERE CDTYPE = 'OD' AND CDNAME = 'MATCHTYPE' UNION SELECT 'ALL' CDVAL, 'ALL' CDCONTENT, -1 LSTODR FROM DUAL) ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT CDVAL VALUE, CDCONTENT DISPLAY,CDVAL VALUECD, CDCONTENT EN_DISPLAY, CDCONTENT DESCRIPTION FROM (SELECT CDVAL, CDCONTENT, LSTODR FROM ALLCODE WHERE CDTYPE = 'CF' AND CDNAME = 'BANKNAME' UNION SELECT '000' CDVAL, 'Cty chứng khoán' CDCONTENT, 0 LSTODR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'ALL' CDVAL, 'Tất cả' CDCONTENT, -1 LSTODR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '111' CDVAL, 'Kết nối ngân hàng' CDCONTENT, -1 LSTODR FROM DUAL ) ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT GRPID VALUE, GRPNAME DISPLAY,GRPID VALUEcd, GRPNAME EN_DISPLAY,GRPNAME DESCRIPTION FROM (SELECT GRPID, GRPNAME,1 LSTODR FROM TLGROUPS WHERE GRPTYPE ='2' UNION SELECT'ALL' TLID, 'ALL' TLFULLNAME, -1 LSTODR FROM DUAL) ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT CDVAL VALUECD, CDCONTENT DISPLAY, CDCONTENT EN_DISPLAY, CDCONTENT DESCRIPTION FROM (SELECT CDVAL, CDCONTENT, LSTODR FROM ALLCODE WHERE CDTYPE = 'SY' AND CDNAME = 'YESNO' UNION SELECT 'ALL' CDVAL, 'ALL' CDCONTENT, -1 LSTODR FROM DUAL) ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT CDVAL VALUE, CDCONTENT DISPLAY,CDVAL VALUECD, CDCONTENT EN_DISPLAY, CDCONTENT DESCRIPTION FROM (SELECT CDVAL, CDCONTENT, LSTODR FROM ALLCODE WHERE CDTYPE = 'OD' AND CDNAME = 'VIA' AND CDVAL !='A' UNION SELECT 'ALL' CDVAL, 'ALL' CDCONTENT, -1 LSTODR FROM DUAL) ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT CDVAL VALUE, CDCONTENT DISPLAY, CDVAL VALUECD, CDCONTENT EN_DISPLAY, CDCONTENT DESCRIPTION, CDCONTENT EN_DESCRIPTION FROM (SELECT CDVAL, CDCONTENT, LSTODR FROM ALLCODE WHERE CDTYPE='OD' AND CDNAME='VIA' AND CDVAL IN ('T','F','O') UNION SELECT 'ALL' CDVAL, 'ALL' CDCONTENT, -1 LSTODR FROM DUAL) ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT GRPID VALUE,GRPNAME DISPLAY, GRPID VALUEcd, GRPNAME EN_DISPLAY,GRPNAME DESCRIPTION FROM (SELECT GRPID, GRPNAME,1 LSTODR FROM TLGROUPS WHERE GRPTYPE ='2' UNION SELECT'ALL' TLID, 'ALL' TLFULLNAME, -1 LSTODR FROM DUAL) ORDER BY DISPLAY

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT VALUECD, DISPLAY, FILTERCD INFO, VALUE, EN_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION FROM VW_CUSTODYCD_SUBACCOUNT WHERE :BRID IS NOT NULL AND :TLID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DISPLAY )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT '' CUSTODYCD, 'ALL' INFO, 0 TOP FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CF.CUSTODYCD, (case when CF.CUSTODYCD is null then '' else CF.CUSTODYCD end)||'.'||CF.FULLNAME INFO --,AF.ACCTNO, --CF.SHORTNAME,CF.FULLNAME,CF.DATEOFBIRTH,CF.IDCODE,CF.IDDATE ,CF.IDCODE || ' - (' || TO_CHAR(CF.IDDATE,'DD/MM/RRRR') || ')' IDCODE_DATE,CF.IDPLACE,CF.ADDRESS, mrloanlimit,t0loanlimit, AF.TLID OLDTLID, AF.CAREBY, CF.CUSTID T_CUSTID --,CASE WHEN NVL(AF.TRADEPHONE,'')='' THEN AF.PHONE1 ELSE AF.TRADEPHONE END PHONE, CF.CONTRACTCHK, NVL(CF.USERNAME, CF.CUSTODYCD) USERNAME, --A1.cdcontent AFSTATUS, cf.T0LOANRATE FROM CFMAST CF, TLGROUPS GRP, AFMAST AF , allcode a1 WHERE AF.CUSTID=CF.CUSTID AND AF.CAREBY = GRP.GRPID and a1.cdtype='RE' and cdname='AFSTATUS' AND A1.cdval=CF.afstatus AND (INSTR('|1|',:BRID)>0 --SUBSTR(CF.CUSTID,1,4) = DECODE('<$BRID>', '<$HO_BRID>', SUBSTR(CF.CUSTID,1,4), '<$BRID>') OR AF.CAREBY IN (SELECT TLGRP.GRPID FROM TLGRPUSERS TLGRP WHERE TLID = :TLID) ) ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT '' CUSTODYCD, 'ALL' INFO, 0 TOP FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT CI.ACCTNO, CF.CUSTODYCD||'.'|| CF.FULLNAME||'.'||AFT.TYPENAME ||'.'||A0.CDCONTENT INFO/*, CI.CUSTID,CI.ACTYPE, --SUBSTR(CI.ACCTNO,1,4) || '.' || SUBSTR(CI.ACCTNO,5,6) ACCTNO, SB.SHORTCD, SUBSTR(CI.AFACCTNO,1,4) || '.' || SUBSTR(CI.AFACCTNO,5,6) AFACCTNO, CF.FULLNAME OWNERNAME, CF.FULLNAME, CF.ADDRESS, CF.IDCODE LICENSE, CF.IDDATE, CF.IDPLACE,AF.BANKACCTNO,AF.BANKNAME, CI.OPNDATE, CI.CLSDATE,CI.LASTDATE, CI.DORMDATE,A0.CDCONTENT STATUS, CI.BALANCE,CI.CRAMT,CI.DRAMT,CI.MBLOCK , CI.CRINTACR,CI.CRINTDT,CI.ODINTACR,CI.ODINTDT,CI.AVRBAL,CI.MDEBIT,CI.MCREDIT,CI.AAMT,CI.RAMT,BAMT, CI.EMKAMT,CI.MMARGINBAL, CI.MARGINBAL,CI.ODLIMIT ,CI.ICCFCD, A1.CDCONTENT ICCFTIED, AF.CAREBY CAREBY, AFT.LNTYPE, getbaldeftrfamt(CI.AFACCTNO) AVLCASH,greatest(getbaldeftrfamtex(CI.AFACCTNO),getbaldefovd(CI.AFACCTNO)) BALDEFTRFAMTEX, getbaldefovd(CI.AFACCTNO) BALDEFOVD,fn_get_account_pp(CI.AFACCTNO,'N') ppo, GREATEST(fn_get_account_pp(CI.AFACCTNO,'N') - AF.MRCRLIMIT,0) P0TDAMT, GET_DFDEBTAMT_RELEASE(CI.AFACCTNO,'U') AVLRELEASE, CI.CIDEPOFEEACR, CI.DEPOFEEAMT, CI.DEPOLASTDT, CI.HOLDBALANCE, CI.COREBANK, (CASE WHEN CI.COREBANK='Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ISCOREBANK*/ FROM CIMAST CI, ALLCODE A0 ,ALLCODE A1,CFMAST CF,SBCURRENCY SB, AFMAST AF, AFTYPE AFT WHERE CF.CUSTID = CI.CUSTID AND CI.CCYCD =SB.CCYCD AND A0.CDTYPE = 'CI' AND A0.CDNAME = 'STATUS' AND A0.CDVAL=CI.STATUS AND A1.CDTYPE = 'SY' AND A1.CDNAME = 'YESNO' AND A1.CDVAL=CI.ICCFTIED AND CI.AFACCTNO = AF.ACCTNO AND AF.ACTYPE = AFT.ACTYPE ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE CUSTODYCD like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT '' CUSTID,'.' INFO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT (CF.CUSTID) CUSTID, (CF.CUSTODYCD||'.'||CF.FULLNAME) INFO FROM CFMAST CF,TLGROUPS GRP WHERE CF.CAREBY = GRP.GRPID AND :BRID IS NOT NULL AND exists (select gu.grpid from tlgrpusers gu where cf.careby = gu.grpid and gu.tlid =:TLID ) ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT '' CUSTID,'.' INFO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT RF.CUSTID, RF.CUSTID||'.'||CF.FULLNAME INFO FROM RECFLNK RF, CFMAST CF, ALLCODE A0 WHERE A0.CDTYPE='RE' AND A0.CDNAME='STATUS' AND A0.CDVAL=RF.STATUS AND RF.CUSTID=CF.CUSTID AND :BRID IS NOT NULL AND :TLID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT '' AUTOID,'.' INFO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT RF.AUTOID, CF.FULLNAME INFO--, RF.FULLNAME GRPNAME, --RF.GRPLEVEL, A0.CDCONTENT DESC_STATUS, RF.CUSTID, RF.EFFDATE, RF.EXPDATE, --RF.FULLNAME || ': ' || CF.FULLNAME RETVALUE, RF.ACTYPE, --SP_FORMAT_REGRP_MAPCODE(RF.AUTOID) MAPCODE, SP_FORMAT_REGRP_GRPLEVEL(RF.AUTOID) MAPLEVEL FROM REGRP RF, CFMAST CF, ALLCODE A0 WHERE A0.CDTYPE='RE' AND A0.CDNAME='STATUS' AND A0.CDVAL=RF.STATUS AND RF.CUSTID=CF.CUSTID AND RF.CUSTID=CF.CUSTID AND RF.STATUS='A' AND :BRID IS NOT NULL AND :TLID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT '' REACCT,'.' INFO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT (CF.CUSTID||'.'||RF.REACTYPE) REACCT,-- RF.AUTOID, CFMAST.FULLNAME INFO--, TYP.ACTYPE, TYP.TYPENAME, A2.CDCONTENT --AFSTATUS, --typ.rerole,A0.CDCONTENT DESC_REROLE, A1.CDCONTENT --DESC_RETYPE, RF.EFFDATE, RF.EXPDATE,RF.ODRNUM, --(CFMAST.FULLNAME || '/'|| TYP.TYPENAME) DESC_TYPE, --CF.CUSTID FROM RECFDEF RF, RETYPE TYP, ALLCODE A0, ALLCODE A1, ALLCODE A2, RECFLNK CF, CFMAST WHERE A0.CDTYPE='RE' AND A0.CDNAME='REROLE' AND A0.CDVAL=TYP.REROLE AND A2.CDTYPE = 'RE' AND A2.CDNAME = 'AFSTATUS' AND A2.CDVAL = TYP.AFSTATUS AND A1.CDTYPE='RE' AND A1.CDNAME='RETYPE' AND A1.CDVAL=TYP.RETYPE AND RF.REACTYPE=TYP.ACTYPE AND RF.REFRECFLNKID = CF.AUTOID AND CF.CUSTID = CFMAST.CUSTID and cf.status = 'A' and rf.status = 'A' AND TYP.REROLE in ('RD') AND RF.EFFDATE <= TO_DATE((select varvalue from sysvar where varname='CURRDATE'),'DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE((select varvalue from sysvar where varname='CURRDATE'),'DD/MM/YYYY')< nvl(RF.CLOSEDATE -1 ,RF.EXPDATE) AND :BRID IS NOT NULL AND :TLID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT M.TLID, M.TLNAME||'.'|| M.TLFULLNAME,M.IDCODE, N.BRNAME, M.TLTITLE, M.TLPRN, A1.CDCONTENT TLGROUP, A2.cdcontent ACTIVE, M.DESCRIPTION FROM TLPROFILES M, ALLCODE A1, BRGRP N, ALLCODE A2 WHERE A1.CDTYPE = 'SA' AND A1.CDNAME = 'TLGROUP' AND A2.CDTYPE = 'SA' AND A2.CDNAME = 'ACTIVE' AND M.ACTIVE = A2.CDVAL AND TRIM(A1.CDVAL)=TRIM(TLGROUP) AND M.BRID = N.BRID AND INSTR('|'||M.BRID||'|0001|',:BRID)>0 AND :TLID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT '' CUSTODYCD, 'ALL' INFO, 0 TOP FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CF.CUSTODYCD, CF.CUSTODYCD ||'.'||CF.FULLNAME INFO FROM CFMAST CF, AFMAST AF,TLGROUPS GRP WHERE AF.CUSTID=CF.CUSTID AND AF.CAREBY = GRP.GRPID AND ( INSTR('|1|',:BRID)>0 --SUBSTR(CF.CUSTID,1,4) = DECODE('<$BRID>', '<$HO_BRID>', SUBSTR(CF.CUSTID,1,4), '<$BRID>') OR AF.CAREBY IN (SELECT TLGRP.GRPID FROM TLGRPUSERS TLGRP WHERE TLID = :TLID) ) ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT '' ACCTNO,'.' INFO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT A.ACCTNO,A.ACCTNO||'.'||T.TYPENAME INFO FROM AFMAST A, CFMAST C, AFTYPE T WHERE A.CUSTID=C.CUSTID AND A.ACTYPE=T.ACTYPE AND :BRID IS NOT NULL AND C.CUSTODYCD= :TLID ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*,RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC) TOP FROM ( SELECT VALUE,SYMBOL||'-'||CATYPE||'-'||CAMASTID INFO FROM V_CAMAST WHERE :TLID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY INFO )A WHERE INFO like :FILTER) WHERE TOP > :LASTID AND TOP <= :MAXID
SELECT * FROM RPTMASTER WHERE LENGTH(:TLID)=4 AND INSTR(:REPORTS,'|'||RPTID||'|')>0

SELECT DEFVAL,EN_CAPTION, ODRNUM,FLDTYPE, FLDMASK, FLDFORMAT, FLDLEN,LLIST, LCHK,VISIBLE, DISABLE, MANDATORY, AMTEXP,VALIDTAG,LOOKUP,DATATYPE,INVNAME, FLDSOURCE, FLDDESC, CHAINNAME, PRINTINFO, LOOKUPNAME, SEARCHCODE, SRMODCODE, INVFORMAT, TAGFIELD,TAGLIST, TAGVALUE,ISPARAM, CTLTYPE, MODCODE, FLDNAME, OBJNAME, DEFNAME, CAPTION FROM RPTFIELDS WHERE :REPORTS=OBJNAME ORDER by ODRNUM
